Welcome to CMVDET’s documentation!

CMVDET is a Python repository for Cytomegalovirus detection in whole-slide images.

To install the latest release, run:

git clone https://github.com/Karnsira/CMVDET.git

See our Detection page for details.

To check the version of CMVDET, run:

CMVDET -v

To detect CMV, you can follow the instructions in our Quickstart page.

Contents

  • Installation
  • Quickstart - Detection of CMV
  • Detection Stage
  • Classification Stage
  • Ensemble Stage
  • Visualization
  • Getting Help

Contacts

If you use CMVDET in your research, please cite

Tungmay T. Phinthuphan and Karn K. Siriwichai, et al., Cytomegalovirus Detection in Whole-Slide Images.

CMVDET is maintained by Tungmay T. Phinthuphan and Karn K. Siriwichai from Chulalongkorn University.

If you want to contribute, please leave an issue in our repo

Thank you!
